name: DataScore
tag_list: big-data, predictive-analytics, customer-lifetime-value, user-acquisition, customer-acquisition, marketing-analytics, online-media
overview:
DataScore is the easiest way to predict your Customer Lifetime Value. We’ll dynamically calculate your ROI by source, affiliate, keyword or any other cohort. Optimize your mobile and web marketing with the power of predictive analytics.

DataScore leverages the power of big data, advanced forecasting, and machine learning into a sophisticated, yet simple to use, marketing intelligence platform.

Customer Lifetime Value is dynamically calculated on a daily basis, by cohort, to enable data-driven user acquisition optimized towards desired profitability targets.

DataScore’s granular, cohort based approach to marketing optimization enables hyper-efficient customer acquisition economics and reduces the risk of purchasing poor ROI traffic, while maximizing scale potential of overall marketing channels.
